alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Okanogan County through 930 PM PDT... At 859 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mazama, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nice Campground, Mazama, Ruffed Grouse Campground, Honeymoon Campground, and Gate Creek Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
